item.description:
A wonderful opportunity has arisen to help give accurate information about Indigo (intuitive) people!

CBS will be here for the day on May 13 to tape for an hour long show for A&E!

You do not have to be interviewed, but we would like a great turnout of the children. They will be learning about nature and also drumming with Steve. We will also be doing some work with the pendulums. If they do not know how to use a pendulum, no worries, we will teach them!!

Please RSVP as to whether you will be able to help with this remarkable opportunity for us all.

Please e-mail me or call 508-892-8928 if you have questions. I will not be available to the phone on Friday, 4/21, but will be checking the e-mail for sure!

dance in the light,

susan gale

P.S. On May 21, we will be hosting the ONLY showing in central MA of Down the Rabbit Hole, an extended Director's cut of What the Bleep... be sure to save the date, more on this later!

Please wear sturdy shoes, open-toed shoes are not good for being in the woods!

For more information, see http://www.placeoflig...
item.name: Opportunity to Help tell the World about Indigos!
